amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 8053 regarding funds for implementing cost-effective agreements for required heating facility modernization in the Kaiserslautern Military Community in the Federal Republic of Germany.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 8053 regarding Kaiserslautem coal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 179 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 179 (Roll no. 335).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Huffman.
